Detailed Description

A functor used to resolve ChannelIDs to Channels.

Used when a packet is received with FLAG_INDEXED_CHANNEL to figure out which channel to deliver it to.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

virtual Mercury::ChannelFinder::~ChannelFinder (  )  [inline, virtual]

Member Function Documentation

virtual Channel* Mercury::ChannelFinder::find ( ChannelID  id,
const Mercury::Address &  srcAddr,
const Packet *  pPacket,
bool &  rHasBeenHandled 
) [pure virtual]

Resolve the provided id to a Channel.

This will be called when an indexed channel packet is received, before any messages are processed, so this function should also set any context necessary for processing the messages on the packet.

Callers should pass the bool parameter in as 'false', and the ChannelFinder should set it to true if the ChannelFinder has dealt with the packet and it should not be processed any further.

Should return NULL if the id cannot be resolved to a Channel.
